question: Is it permissbale to have two pieces of najaz on differrent parts of clothes during salaat?
answer:
QUESTION
Salaam Aleikum dear Mufti. Please give fatwa on the following: Is it permissbale to have two pieces of najaz on differrent parts of clothes during salaat?
ANSWER


Share:
If there are two pieces of Najis on different parts of the clothes, but when one adds the two together it is more than the hollow of the palm, then Salaat is not valid.

If it is less that the hollow of the palm, the Salaat will be valid, but will be Makrooh.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
